sentence.Network_cn: 她由于激动变得很健谈。

sentence.Network_en: Evelyn was very voluble on the subject of women's rights.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊夫林谈起女权这个话题口若悬河。

sentence.Network_en: He became very voluble and told her everything.
sentence.Network_cn: 他变得滔滔不绝,把一切都告诉了她.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 描述性格的英语单词汇总_百度文库 ... tireless 孜孜不倦的 voluble 健谈的 Personality 性格.
蓝宝词典 ... volition n. 行使意志，决择 voluble adj. 健谈的，流利的 voluminous adj. 卷数多的,大量的,庞大的.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... benevolence n 善心，仁慈 voluble a 流畅的；滔滔不绝的 vulgar a 大众的，粗俗的.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... benevolence n 善心，仁慈 voluble a 流畅的；滔滔不绝的 vulgar a 大众的，粗俗的.

list.abs: Her explanations for failure to do the work were voluble but not easily believed., 他对工作失误的辩解是流利的 , 但难以令人相信.
volubility中文 ... - eloquence volubility 谈锋 - with volubility 滔滔不绝地 - Excessive volubility 多言癖，妄辩.
Self - esteem is the most voluble of the emotions ., 自尊心是最无常的感情.
she is an extremely voluble young woman who engages in soliloquies not conversations ., 这位少妇非常健谈 , 以致于她可以沉浸在自言自语中而不需要交谈者.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin volubilis, from volvere 'to roll'. Earlier use in late Middle English included the senses 'rotating about an axis' and 'having a tendency to change', also meanings of the Latin word

entry.def: If you say that someone is voluble, you mean that they talk a lot with great energy and enthusiasm.

example.tran: 她由于激动变得很健谈。

example.ex: Bert is a voluble, gregarious man.
example.tran: 伯特是个能说会道、善于交际的人。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by a ready flow of speech;

sentences.sentence: "she is an extremely voluble young woman who engages in soliloquies not conversations"

auth_sentence.content: I get very voluble on even one glass of sherry.

auth_sentence.content: Malik is an engaging and voluble exception.

stems_affixes.word_buile: evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱说话的, 有口才的, 流利的, 健谈的, [罕]易旋转的, 缠绕的

stems_affixes.word_buile: volume卷,册+inous多……的→多卷[册]的→长篇的
evolu=evolve[v.[使]发展;[使]进化;[使]进展]+tion表名词→n.进化,演变,发展,进展
evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的
re回,翻+volu转,卷+tion表名词→转翻→革命
volu转,卷+me→卷→一卷书[古时的书籍成卷形]
volu转,卷+te→n. 涡形;螺旋形;涡螺壳
